feels.name: Anger
feels.quote: I am very sorry about it,” she said; “I have carefully thought things over. We are too different. I must ask you to release me, and try to forget that there ever was such a foolish girl.

feels.name: Anger
feels.quote: You always think women don’t mean what they say.

feels.name: Disgust
feels.quote: You aren’t like yourself. You’re tired, Lucy.

feels.name: Anger
feels.quote: You sound tired, as if something has worried you.

feels.name: Disgust
feels.quote: You must excuse me if I say stupid things, but my brain has gone to pieces.

feels.name: Confusion
feels.quote: I don’t understand you. You aren’t like yourself. You’re tired, Lucy.

feels.name: Confusion
feels.quote: Well, you sound tired, as if something has worried you.

feels.name: Confusion
feels.quote: You had that bad headache yesterday—All right
